sect1.title: &susemgr; Requirements
sect1.para: This chapter will discuss the following topics:

sect1.title: Prerequisites
sect1.para: To register &susemgr; you will need a registration key. This key will be provided to you after buying the product or you can find this key located at https://scc.suse.com. Login with your &suse; or &novell; credentials. If this is not a production system or only used for testing, a 60 day evaluation key can be obtained from On this page click on "TRY SUSE MANAGER". The evaluation key will limit the number of systems that can register to SUSE Manager to 10. To enable synchronization from the SUSE repositories valid NCC/SCC mirror credentials are needed. During the installation the mirror credentials will be requested.
